metadata.synopsis: Players comment on Lae'zel's fate after seeing her turned into a shadowcreature after telling her to go look for the creche on her own.
metadata.how_to_trigger: See Shadowcursed Laezel creature in SCL after telling her to go look for the creche on her own in Act2.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Is that...? Hells - the shadows have taken Lae'zel.
